name: Shoot That Tree!!! or die
description:
Little prototype, 6 levels.  Was made for the VimJam 3

Fullscreen recomended - some UI not visible in page mode.

"Multi-use"  - you can use a shotgun for chopping trees, jumping, destroying obstacles and for warming character.

 "Turn up the heat".  - on every level your goal is shoot that tree, get wood and not freeze to death!

Controls:

Move on WASD or Arrows

Shoot on Left Mouse Button. 

( you can jump for longer distance if you run in direction of the jump)
